briefdescription.para: Default entry of CPU exceptions, such as TLB miss and swap.
Normal interrupt exception entry. In default, all interrupt exceptions are installed with normal entry. If FIRQ is required, exc_entry_firq should be the entry.

detaileddescription.para: < number of CPU exceptions number of interrupt exceptions, defined in arc_feature_config.h

Install exception entry table to ARC_AUX_INT_VECT_BASE in startup. According to ARCv2 ISA, vectors are fetched in instruction space and thus may be present in ICCM, Instruction Cache, or main memory accessed by instruction fetch logic. So it is put into a specific section .vector.
Please note that the exc_entry_table maybe cached in ARC. Some functions is defined in .s files.

briefdescription.para: Check whether the specific interrupt is enabled.

simplesect.para: Interrupt priority masking threshold, negative num

parameterdescription.para: Interrupt priority masking threshold, negative num

briefdescription.para: Get current interrupt priority masking threshold.
Set interrupt secure or not secure.
Unlock cpu with the specific status.
Initialize the exception and interrupt handling.

inbodydescription.para: ipm should be set after cpu unlock restore to avoid reset of the status32 value

briefdescription.para: Get the installed CPU exception entry.
